mapper.insert: insert into project (id, catagory_id, sponsor, detail_id, target_money, target_deadline, cover, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, name, description ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catagoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sponsor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{targetMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{targetDeadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARBINARY}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update project set catagory_id = #{catagoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sponsor = #{sponsor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, detail_id = #{detailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, target_money = #{targetMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, target_deadline = #{targetDeadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cover = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARBINARY}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, catagory_id, sponsor, detail_id, target_money, target_deadline, cover, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, name, description from project where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, catagory_id, sponsor, detail_id, target_money, target_deadline, cover, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, name, description from project

select id, catagory_id, sponsor, detail_id, target_money, target_deadline, cover, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, name, description from project where catagory_id=#{catagoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
